title: An Interview with Susan George
creator_credit: Mary Leggett, Freedom From Hunger and Mark Stiles
brief_description: Susan George, food economist and author of “How the other half dies” talks about food distribution in the world, reasons for starvation amongst third world peoples and the influence of the western world upon third world hunger problems.
